item.description:
Join DCR staff for a fun and informative hike where we'll identify some of the different tree species that live here, as well as visit a Continuous Forestry Inventory (CFI) plot to learn about some of the information our foresters have gathered about the forest over the years. Also, learn about some of the forest management techniques, such as prescribed burns and mechanized hazardous fuel removal. 

For adults who can hike 2-3 miles of moderately difficult trails. Please wear long pants, good hiking shoes, bring water, and take precautions against ticks. Program cancelled in the event of rain.

Space is limited and pre-registration is required. Call (508) 866-2580 x161 to pre-register and to find out the meeting location. This free program is sponsored by the Massachusetts Department of Conservation & Recreation.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: DCR Forestry Hike at Myles Standish State Forest
